description:
Battle Pass item for "Goonya Monster".

Purchasing this item can unlock the locked Episode 4 reward item and will be able to earn that item by fulfilling the acquisition requirements.

In addition, the following effects are included as a purchase bonus. 
- Infinity Cookie Only in Episode 4(1.2x)
* If used in conjunction with other cookies, the gain rate will be multiplied.
name: Battle Pass : Episode 4 + Infinity Cookie
